name: Unforgotten Stories: A Partition Odyssey
description: Unforgotten Stories: A Partition Odyssey invites you to step into the shoes of one of the developer's grandmother as you journey through a 3D world full of stealth, exploration, and deep storytelling. Experience the heart-wrenching realities of being a seven-year-old ripped away from your home city and forced to relocate during the tumultuous Pakistani-Indian Partition. Can you survive the journey and uncover the truth behind your family's past?
